Html:
Hello,

I have a serious issue, which I couldn't find a way to solve.

I am reading an Excel 2007 file. I want to write some data in a cell which previously I made it Right-to-left (Before reading the excel, I did this-> right click-> Alignment-> Text Direction -> Right-to-Left)

But after reading the Excel file and writing data into it and open the Excel, there is no change in text direction.

Is there any way in PHPEXCEL to make a cells text direction Right-to-Left?

 

thanks
Not for individual cells, we only provide a flag for setting it at worksheet level.
